Package com.stormpath.sdk.directory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountStore  
    AccountStoreOptions<T>
    Options that may be specified when retrieving Directory or Application resources.
    AccountStoreVisitor  
    CustomData
    A CustomData is a Map resource within an Account or a Group, that allows you to specify whatever name/value pairs you wish.
    Directory
    A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.
    DirectoryCriteria
    An Directory-specific Criteria class, enabling a Directory-specific fluentquery DSL.
    DirectoryList
    A CollectionResource containing Directory instances.
    DirectoryOptions<T>
    Directory-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Directory resources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Directories
    Static utility/helper methods for working with Directory resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DirectoryStatus
